name: Carrier
description:
With 'Striker' and 'Ammo Case' as default Precepts, Carrier is a seeker Sentinel. Carrier also comes with a shotgun weapon.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.name: Alloy Plate
components.description: Carbon steel plates used to reinforce Grineer armor.

patchlogs.name: The Sacrifice: Hotfix 23.0.8
patchlogs.changes: Made minor optimizations to Carrier's Looter precept.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.3.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Carrier's Looter precept not working for some Plains resources like Grokdrul containers.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Update 20.7.0
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed enemies deployed by Condor Dropships in Excavation missions being defensive and fortifying the area they were deployed; these enemies would prevent crucial Power Cell Carrier reinforcements from arriving.
Fixed disarming Corpus Power Carriers resulting in their Provas floating outside of their hands.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.10.0
patchlogs.additions: Many, many months ago we showed our community something we nicknamed 'baby's first Sentinel'. This quirky looking Sentinel has arrived, and it serves a very clear purpose: provide new players with an introduction to the Companion System. New player experience is always on our mind as Developers. This new Sentinel joining your Arsenal has that exact new-player approach to it’s functionality and mechanics. Say hello to TAXON! Perhaps Taxon will not replace the Mastery Rank 23 player's beloved Carrier, but please keep in mind that it was created and geared towards new-players who are experiencing Warframe for the first time.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Carrier's Ammo Case Mod being exploitable.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Update 19.4.2 + 19.4.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the fire rate issues for the Mutalist Carrier Osprey to ensure consistency across different behaviors.

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix #2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ammo Case still applying its buffs after Carrier has died.

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within
patchlogs.changes:
It’s been a long time coming and a highly request change! If you hadn’t guessed it already, Carrier usage represents almost 80% of the total used Sentinels, and considering we have more than 5 unique choices this needed balancing. Today we're eager to introduce a community driven experiment within the Sentinel class. This is not the final book in this conversation, just the beginning.
We've also mentioned Kubrow/Kavat are not off the table. What we want to do is measure. We know where Carrier sits in usage compared to the rest of the options. We want a calculated release of a change that will deliver on giving Sentinels the function of Vacuum, and see how it affects the usage of content in that category. The results are something we'll be sharing as it should be very interesting to everyone invested in this particular topic. The shovel in the ground on this will apply to Sentinels first, but Pets aren't off the table.
We're starting with Sentinels to have this contained group of content analyzed. We will be keeping a close eye on how all of you feel about the new vacuum as well as looking at metrics to see how the distribution of sentinel usage changes across the community (right now 80% of you use Carrier)! We will share results along the way as a team, as soon as this Friday on Devstream #81!
Carrier’s precept has been automatically changed to Ammo Case

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U4+4.1
patchlogs.changes: Carrier’s Vacuum and Corpus Scavenger Drones will no longer be able to pick up or affect the placement of Ayatan Stars. This was causing Stars to become unreachable or falling through the floor.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.13.0: TennoGen, Passives, & Reworks
patchlogs.fixes: •    Fixed Carrier sometimes trying to Vacuum Energy orbs when you were at max Energy capacity; because it couldn't actually pick them up it would drag them around after you making endless squishing sounds as per: https://youtu.be/9ilwT_iP_aU

patchlogs.name: Update 18.10.0: Operation Rathuum!
patchlogs.fixes: ·         Carrier's Vacuum now behaves in coorelation to the owning player's movement. It will not continuously vacuum the same spot for too long

patchlogs.name: Update 18.6
patchlogs.fixes: Players can now trade the Carrier Sentinel’s Looter Mod.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.5: Sands of Inaros
patchlogs.fixes: Scavenger Drones, Sapping Ospreys, Leech Ospreys, Mine Ospreys and Mutalist Osprey Carriers can now be spawned in the Simulacrum.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.9
patchlogs.changes: Removed 3 redundant drone types from the codex (there were manual entries for Infestation    Attack Mutalist, Mutalist Lightning Carrier, and Mutalist Toxic Carrier that were no longer needed).

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a potential issue causing pickups to become stuck to the Carrier Sentinel as a Host.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.4.0
patchlogs.changes: Enabled Scavenger Drones, Sapping Ospreys, Leech Ospreys, Mine Ospreys, and Mutalist Osprey Carriers in the Simulacrum.

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.changes: Tuned Energy Cell Carrier spawn-rates to be similar for all Excavation missions.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Infested Carrier Drones now have a unique explosion FX.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed projectiles from Infested Carriers in the J-3 Golem fight not properly dealing damage to players.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.additions:
Mutalist Lightning Carrier: Carries Lightning Crawlers
Mutalist Toxic Carrier: Carries Toxic Crawlers

patchlogs.name: Update 17.3.0
patchlogs.changes:
T4D Rotation B: Forma BP for Prime Carrier Systems.
T3S Rotation C: Forma BP for Prime Carrier BP.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Carrier pulling items towards players while on a Rampart.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes: Carrier's Vacuum will no longer pick up items while the player is bleeding out.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where ammo pickups mutated by Hosts would confuse Clients-side Carriers as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/480877-carrier-looting-bug-ammo-clicking/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.2
patchlogs.changes:
Carrier Prime Psa:
Please note that all tiers of Prime Access now include Carrier Prime with this Hotfix. Once the hotfix is live, we will be running a script to give all eligible accounts their Carrier Primes. An account is eligible for Carrier Prime if they have purchased the Covert or Shuriken Ash Prime Access packs. We will let you know when the script is complete.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Carrier Prime’s Carapace description reading the description for Wyrm Prime.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.11: Ash Prime + Hotfix 16.11.1
patchlogs.fixes:
including Ash Prime, Vectis Prime and Carrier Prime. Plus, stock up on discounted Platinum and get Exclusive Gear available only through Prime Access!
Fixed Ash, Vectis and Carrier parts not dropping for players in the Void.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Para Carrier skin showing code in its description.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed items vacuumed in by the Carrier becoming stuck to the Carrier.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.6.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Carrier Sentinels not sucking in Sigils and other item drops.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Carrier’s Vacuum not picking up Pigments.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Carrier Sentinel dragging items that have not (or cannot) be claimed, following the player forever.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Stamina orbs in the Dojo becoming vacuumed up by Carrier for eternity.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Corpus Power Carrier appearing twice in the Codex.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.1.0+15.1.01
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Power Cell Carrier enemies not spawning in Limbo Quest Excavation mission.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.5.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Infested Crawlers occasionally attacking their teammates if deployed right as their Carrier is destroyed.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.9
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed crash that would occur when trying to remove the Parrot skin from your Carrier.
Fixed the Carrier sentinel being seemingly 1 hit killed by enemy Kubrows and Volatile Infested.

patchlogs.name: Update 12.6.0: Dex Furis (Limited Time Gift!)
patchlogs.changes: The targeting range for the attack precepts at max-rank are as follows:Carrier: 10mDethCube: 30mDjinn: 60mWyrm: 30mShade: 30m(Unranked attack precepts will have half the range listed above).Helios is special at does not increase with rank (it is always 10m) however ranking up the Targeting Receptor precept increase the number of active glaives it can manage.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 11.5.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue where Carrier’s Vacuum would try and suck up ammo drops if you had maximum ammo and the scanner equipped.

patchlogs.name: Update 10.3.0: Hump Day!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed emblem deco positions on Carrier and Djinn sentinels.

patchlogs.name: Update 10.2.0
patchlogs.fixes: Carrier would only suck up drops with Vacuum if the host has not picked them up already. Now he sucks up drops regardless of if the host has picked them up!

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 10.1.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed emblem positions on Carrier and Djinn Sentinels

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.8.0 + Hotfix 22.8.0.1

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Prisma Jet Sentinel Wings diorama and store description wrongfully warning that the wings are a cosmetic for the Diriga only when they are available for all Sentinels.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U4+4.1
patchlogs.changes: The new Nightwatch Skin Pack will include skins for: Grinlok, Tonkor, Marelok, Brakk, Diriga, Dual Cleavers, Machete and Jat Kittag. Find them in the Market today!

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: •    Fixed the Diriga Sentinel's interaction with Arc Traps causing a game crash.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.5: Sands of Inaros
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Kubrow and the Diriga attacking enemies after a stealth kill.  They will now wait for a target to be ‘alerted’ before choosing to attack.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.10.0
patchlogs.changes:
The following change has been made to help bring some additional utility to the Diriga.  We will continue to monitor the Diriga after launch to provide additional balance to this unique trait if necessary.
Diriga’s Calculated Shot Precept is now able to target Sensor Bars and Arc Traps.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Diriga and Vulklok missing from the Codex.

patchlogs.fixes:
Diriga 
The Diriga shocks nearby enemies, and picks off distant threats, utilizing the Vulklok sniper rifle and the ‘Calculated Shot’, ‘Arc Coil’ and ‘Electro Pulse’ precepts.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.20.8 + 22.20.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Djinn’s Reawaken Mod not Reviving your Sentinel while controlling the Operator.

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix #3
patchlogs.additions: Added back Djinn’s buff icon in the form of a Corrosive Proc icon.

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix 1
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed a missing Platinum price on the Djinn Deluxe Bundle (Gazal Complete Collection).
Fixed gifting not working for the Djinn Deluxe Bundle (Gazal Complete Collection).

patchlogs.name: Update 18.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: •    Fixed Djinn’s Fatal Attraction activating on unalerted enemies.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.7.1
patchlogs.changes: •    Djinn’s Fatal Attraction will no longer affect enemies that have a resistance to being mind controlled. This should prevent issues in completing the Lephantis boss fight with a Djinn equipped.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.3
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Djinn's Fatal Attraction leaving enemies mesmerized permanently if the sentinel was killed while luring.
Fixed Djinn being unable to mesmerize enemies without guns (eg: melee-only units).

patchlogs.name: Update 18.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Djinn's Fatal Attraction mesmerising targets that cannot target the player.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.2.0
patchlogs.changes: Djinn’s Fatal Attraction will now ignore security cameras.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Djinn’s Fatal Attraction ability not functioning on ragdolled enemies.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes: The Djinn’s Fatal Attraction ability now makes all enemies approach the Djinn.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.6.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with multiple Djinn entries being listed in the Codex.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.5.0: Edo Armor & Nami Solo
patchlogs.changes: Fixed issues with many Sentinel precepts having their priority subverted by other slotted precepts. Example, if you ever noticed your Djinn would never seem to cast Fatal Attraction, it is likely because it was slotted in the 2nd/3rd/4th Precept Slot and was not properly prioritized.

patchlogs.name: Update 12.6.0: Dex Furis (Limited Time Gift!)
patchlogs.changes: The targeting range for the attack precepts at max-rank are as follows:Carrier: 10mDethCube: 30mDjinn: 60mWyrm: 30mShade: 30m(Unranked attack precepts will have half the range listed above).Helios is special at does not increase with rank (it is always 10m) however ranking up the Targeting Receptor precept increase the number of active glaives it can manage.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed emblem deco positions on Carrier and Djinn sentinels.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed emblem positions on Carrier and Djinn Sentinels

name: Helios
description:
With 'Investigator' as its unique Precept and 'Deconstructor' as its weapon, the versatile Helios Sentinel acts as both a lethal guardian and an automatic codex scanner. Scans require an equipped Codex Scanner and an available charge.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

Note: This item requires two open slots.

patchlogs.name: The Sacrifice: Hotfix 23.0.8

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.17.4
patchlogs.changes: Optimized Helios' Investigator Precept: it should now find targets more than 10x faster and no longer causes periodic spikes in frame-time as high as 7ms.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.15.0
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Helios' Detect Vulnerability precept not applying the Damage multiplier on enemies seated in mounted guns or Jesters riding Kuva Guardians.
Fixed cases where Helios began vibrating when equipped with the Investigator precept.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Helios and Helios Prime take a long time to find a new target after being interrupted.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.4.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crash from Helios’ Detect Vulnerability Precept.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Update 19.12.0
patchlogs.changes: Deconstructor Prime can now be used on non-Prime Helios.
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed file paths appearing for Helios Prime when crafting it in the Foundry.
Fixed being able to equip Deconstructor on a Sentinel that is not Helios.

patchlogs.name: Banshee Prime: Hotfix 19.11.5 + 19.11.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a bug where non-Helios Sentinels could equip the Deconstructor when randomizing their loadout.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.1.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where reviving would cause Helios to scan targets with complete Codex entries as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/423544-bug-helios-scans-completed-scan-targets-after-reviving-yourself/?hl=helios

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed an issue where if Helios restarts his scan, players would lose all Codex information gained in the Mission so far.
Fixed the energy color of Helios not applying to his center ‘eye’ until you back out of Appearance in the Arsenal.
Fixed issue with Helios caused by viewing another player’s profile then entering a Mission, causing Helios to count scans from other player’s completed Codex.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue with Helios not scanning properly.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Archwing
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a number of problems with the Codex Scanner (including Helios’s user of the Scanner):

patchlogs.name: Update 14.5: Operation Cryotic Front!
patchlogs.fixes: • Fixed Helios endlessly rescanning things not in the Codex. Specific examples: void turrets, arc traps, Grineer laser sensors above doors, smashable grates & fans.

patchlogs.fixes: Helios Changes:

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 13.4.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue with Helios' incorrectly scanning objects outside of the players aim as well as objects whose Codex entry is already complete. Helio sfix, Codex entries for crates will follow.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.3.0: Pack Hunters
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Helios' Investigator Precept not properly displaying/calculating its max rank and perpetually behaving like a rank 0 mod. It will also receive a target lock so it doesn’t Get distracted during scans so easily.

patchlogs.name: The Sacrifice: Prime Vault Hotfix 23.1.2!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Prisma Shade removing cosmetics as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/787411-shade-stealth-ability-can-remove-head-or-cosmetics/

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Gara's Splinter Storm not dealing damage while invisible (Shade, Huras, Octavia etc).

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Shade's Ghost removing cosmetics from your invisible silhouette.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.2.1
patchlogs.changes: Removed water caustics when running in Low Shader Quality; this should improve framerate on Earth in particular but other tilesets should benefit in places.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.2.0 + 21.2.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Approximated certain lighting calculations when using Low Shader Quality to improve performance; this will be most helpful for the Earth tileset because of the day/night cycle but there should be improvements throughout all remastered tilesets.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.5
patchlogs.changes: Optimized mission loading slightly for people using High Shader Quality.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue allowing Shade Sentinel and Huras Kubrow cloaks to stealth players still firing weapons with large magazines.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Shade Sentinel’s Ghost and the Hura's Stalk Ability not properly functioning.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 13.1.2
patchlogs.changes: Scaled the Wings and Tail of the Shade Sentinel when using the Sprite skin.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.1.0: Amprex
patchlogs.fixes: New Sprite Skin for the Shade Sentinel!

patchlogs.name: Update 12.6.0: Dex Furis (Limited Time Gift!)
patchlogs.changes: The targeting range for the attack precepts at max-rank are as follows:Carrier: 10mDethCube: 30mDjinn: 60mWyrm: 30mShade: 30m(Unranked attack precepts will have half the range listed above).Helios is special at does not increase with rank (it is always 10m) however ranking up the Targeting Receptor precept increase the number of active glaives it can manage.

patchlogs.name: Update 7.7.3: Level Expansions And New Weapons!
patchlogs.fixes: Shade sentinel will now cloak as well when casting Ghost

name: Taxon
description:
With 'Retarget' and 'Molecular Conversion' as its default Precepts, Taxon protects its owner with shield restoration. Equipped with the Artax ice-beam.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description:
With 'Retarget' and 'Molecular Conversion' as its default Precepts, Taxon protects its owner with shield restoration. Equipped with the Artax ice-beam.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.name: Ferrite
components.description: Alloy pellets used in Grineer manufacturing.

components.name: Neurodes
components.description: Biotech sensor organ harvested from Infested entities.

components.name: Polymer Bundle
components.description: A hard, thermoplastic casing. Manufactured by Corpus.

components.name: Rubedo
components.description: A jagged crystalline ore. Gives off radiant energy.

patchlogs.name: Banshee Prime: Hotfix 19.11.5 + 19.11.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not receiving the Vacuum Mod upon crafting Taxon. You should receive the Vacuum Mod upon relog!

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.11.0+19.11.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Taxon Inbox message missing a comma.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.10.1+19.10.1.1
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked Taxon’s Molecular Conversion’s damage conversion value (per rank) to 50, 75, 100, 125, 150, 200 (previously 50, 100, 150, 200, 200, 200).

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.10.0
patchlogs.additions:
Many, many months ago we showed our community something we nicknamed 'baby's first Sentinel'. This quirky looking Sentinel has arrived, and it serves a very clear purpose: provide new players with an introduction to the Companion System. New player experience is always on our mind as Developers. This new Sentinel joining your Arsenal has that exact new-player approach to it’s functionality and mechanics. Say hello to TAXON! Perhaps Taxon will not replace the Mastery Rank 23 player's beloved Carrier, but please keep in mind that it was created and geared towards new-players who are experiencing Warframe for the first time.
Newly awoken Tenno will gain this Sentinel Blueprint by completing the first Junction between Earth and Venus. If you have already completed this Junction, you will receive Taxon’s Blueprint in your Inbox upon login and can be found in the Market for Credits!

name: Wyrm
description:
With 'Warrior' and 'Crowd Dispersion' as default Precepts, Wyrm is a highly offensive Sentinel. Wyrm also comes with a laser rifle.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.name: Alloy Plate
components.description: Carbon steel plates used to reinforce Grineer armor.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description:
With 'Warrior' and 'Crowd Dispersion' as default Precepts, Wyrm is a highly offensive Sentinel. Wyrm also comes with a laser rifle.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.name: Circuits
components.description: Various electronic components.

components.name: Control Module
components.description: Autonomy processor for Robotics. A Corpus design.

components.name: Nano Spores
components.description: Fibrous technocyte tumour. Handle Infested tissue with caution.

patchlogs.name: The Sacrifice: Hotfix 23.0.2 + 23.0.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crash when respawning in Wyrmius.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.16.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Final Boss health bar remaining on the screen if you continue to play the Wyrmius mini game after defeating it.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.11.1
patchlogs.changes: Ember Prime, Frost Prime, Loki Prime, Wyrm Prime, Bo Prime, Sicarus Prime, Glaive Prime, Latron Prime, and Reaper Prime Relics have been added as Cetus Bounty rewards for a limited time. You can also find these limited Vaulted Relics in Relic Packs from the Market or as Syndicate rewards.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.6.0
patchlogs.changes: Warframe’s first Prime Sentinel, Wyrm Prime, has had its base Health increased from 100 to 225!

patchlogs.name: Update 18.12.0: Vauban Prime & 18.12.1
patchlogs.changes:
•    Loki Prime, Bo Prime, and Wyrm Prime have been removed from the Void and put into the Prime Vault until further notice.
Removed Wyrm Prime Blueprint from T2 Exterminate reward table.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.10.0: Operation Rathuum!
patchlogs.fixes:
·         Improved Wyrm’s Crowd Dispersion missing enemies that were very close to you.
·         Wyrm’s Crowd Dispersion range has been re-scaled as you upgrade it. Previously the range maxed out at 10m at rank 3, now it scales from 6, 6.8, 7.6, 8.4, 9.2,10 meters
·         Tweaked Wyrm’s Crowd Dispersion physics to make the knock-back more realistic.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.5: Sands of Inaros
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Wyrmius’ key bindings not being properly set until after the first time the player had revived.
Fixed enemies not properly spawning in Wyrmius from the login screen.
Fixed Wyrmius’ Osprey enemies vibrating when attempting to move.
Fixed turrets in Wyrmius getting stuck in the ceiling on spawn.
Fixed turrets in Wyrmius not firing properly.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error in Wyrmius’ loading screen causing an oversized Liset to appear instead of a Wyrm.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.3.1 + 18.3.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed crash when pressing controller's Start button to play Wyrmius.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an error causing no enemies to spawn in Wyrmius.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a permanent motion blur effect that would occur after the second room in Wyrmius.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes: Wyrm Prime now has 150 base Armor.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Carrier Prime’s Carapace description reading the description for Wyrm Prime.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Wyrmius respawning behind a wall if the player died behind a wall.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.13.1
patchlogs.fixes: * Fixed Wyrm Prime’s energy colors not displaying properly.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.changes: Added health bars to Wyrmius bosses.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.11.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Wyrmius being able to shoot during respawn period.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.11
patchlogs.changes:
Wyrmius, the most anticipated Warframe-themed; side-scrolling mini game of the year is here!
Use Wyrm’s signature laser rifle to blast through increasingly challenging enemies in this Sentinel-based space shooter.
To play, visit your Arsenal and Equip Wyrm. Visit ‘Appearance’ and select the ‘W’ loadout at the top of the screen. Could it be any simpler? Yes, yes it could be but it’s not.

patchlogs.name: 13.9.0 + 13.9.0.1: The Venka
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issues with rotation of Event Emblems on Wyrm Prime.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue with Wyrm Prime Blueprint not being tradeable.

patchlogs.name: Update 12.6.0: Dex Furis (Limited Time Gift!)
patchlogs.changes: The targeting range for the attack precepts at max-rank are as follows:Carrier: 10mDethCube: 30mDjinn: 60mWyrm: 30mShade: 30m(Unranked attack precepts will have half the range listed above).Helios is special at does not increase with rank (it is always 10m) however ranking up the Targeting Receptor precept increase the number of active glaives it can manage.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 9.4: Double Affinity Weekend!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixes for badges on Wyrm and DethCube being offset.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 8.2: Tenno Reinforcement
patchlogs.fixes:
Fix for Wyrm’s crowd dispersion not being able to stun certain enemy types.
Fix for Wyrm’s crowd dispersion not stunning certain enemies during attack sequences.
Fixed range damage issues with Wyrm’s crowd dispersion.

name: Wyrm Prime
description: Both bodyguard and status symbol, the Wyrm Prime Sentinel was the last line of defense for high ranking Tenno in the Orokin Era.
